dish_description: One pot. Garlic. Parmesan. Pasta. Need we say more? This dish is the ultimate in easy weeknight meals, with all the flavor and none of the fuss.
If you're in need of a hug in a bowl, this creamy chicken penne pasta is just the ticket. With tender chicken, perfectly cooked pasta, and a velvety sauce, it's pure comfort in a bowl.
This 2-ingredient pasta is a quick and easy dinner option, with pasta and your favorite jarred sauce.
This 2-ingredient pasta is a quick and easy dinner option, with pasta and your favorite jarred sauce.

This easy 30-minute pasta recipe transforms ingredients that you already have in your kitchen into a posh, seafood dish you'll want to serve at your next dinner party. And since the whole dish is made in a single pot, clean-up is easy. Don't be surprised if this becomes your favorite quick go-to.
Ever wanted the full fixings of a fajita in pasta form? These toppings make for a well-seasoned and well-balanced one-dish dinner!
Get ready to be cheesin' from ear to ear with this Cheesy Chicken Alfredo Pasta Bake - loaded with gooey cheese, al dente pasta, and tender chicken, this dish is pure comfort in a bowl.

Savor the bold flavors of this Tomato and Anchovy Pasta, a perfect weeknight meal that's both simple and satisfying. With a zesty tomato sauce and umami-packed anchovies, this dish will have your taste buds dancing in no time!
Whip up a comforting, one-pot wonder with this Chicken and Mushroom Pasta recipe. It's a creamy, savory delight that'll have everyone asking for seconds!

Nothing spells comfort like Italian food. Steaming bowls of pasta, buttery, roasted garlic bread, and tureens of the most flavorful sauces: it's all right there. Sometimes, you want to bring that comfort into your very own kitchen and, well, we've got just the recipe for you. This easy chicken alfredo penne will have you saying 'mangia!' before you even know it.
This One-Pot Cheeseburger Pasta is a delightful twist on a classic favorite. With its savory flavors and easy clean-up, this dish is perfect for busy weeknights and satisfying comfort food cravings.
This garlic bacon shrimp alfredo is the ultimate weeknight indulgence, with succulent shrimp, smoky bacon, and a rich, creamy sauce that will have your taste buds dancing with delight.

This easy mac and cheese is a quick and delicious dinner option for busy weeknights! Elbow macaroni is cooked right in the same pot with milk, butter, and Cheddar cheese, resulting in a creamy and comforting dish that's sure to please everyone. Add in some chopped bacon or cooked veggies for a twist on the classic recipe, or enjoy it as-is for a simple and satisfying meal.

This chicken spinach alfredo rotini pasta is a creamy and comforting dish that is perfect for a family dinner or a date night at home. With tender chicken, fresh spinach, and a rich alfredo sauce, it's a delicious and indulgent meal. Try it today and treat yourself to something special.

Whip up a delightful one-pan wonder with this Garlic Chicken Pesto Pasta recipe. Bursting with flavor, this dish combines tender chicken, aromatic pesto, and perfectly cooked pasta for a meal that's sure to impress.
Savory Swedish meatballs, pasta, and a creamy sauce combine in this deliciously hearty one-pot meal.
This spicy and flavorful pasta dish features juicy Cajun-spiced chicken in a creamy alfredo sauce, perfect for a satisfying dinner.

You won't believe your eyes when you see this 100-layer lasagna! It's a tower of deliciousness filled with layers of pasta, meat sauce, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella cheese. It's like a work of art that you can eat!
Spaghetti with garlic and oil is a classic Italian dish that's quick and easy to make, with just a few simple ingredients.

This one-pot chicken spinach bacon alfredo is an easy and delicious weeknight dinner that will satisfy your taste buds. With creamy alfredo sauce, tender chicken, savory bacon, and fresh spinach, it's a perfect comfort food. Try this recipe and impress your family and friends!
This classic Italian dish features penne pasta in a rich and creamy vodka sauce, perfect for a cozy night in.
This 3-Ingredient Teriyaki Chicken is a total game-changer - with its perfect balance of salty and sweet, this dish is sure to kick up your weeknights with minimal effort required.

Sometimes the best things come in one pot! This baked chicken and rice dish saves you the cleanup without skimping on flavor. After you quickly pan fry your seasoned chicken, remove it and cook garlic and onions in the leftover juices. Add rice and broth, cook everything, and top with the chicken before baking for another 35 minutes (optional: broil the chicken separately to get a crispier skin.) You'll be left with a mountain of food so delicious, you'll meal prep this super easy recipe at least once a week forever.

Picture yourself on the coast of Tuscany, Italy. Flowy clothes, a beautiful breeze, and a view of the Tuscan Sea: you're ready to book your next vacation, aren't you? Well, we're here to bring Tuscany to you. How, you may ask? Well, that's what our easy Tuscan chicken is here for. Loaded with fresh veggies, herbs, and rich Parmesan cheese, it'll have you saying 'That's amore!'

Getting take-out is a crave-worthy indulgence. And with our easy chicken veggie stir fry recipe, you can recreate the magic of a Chinese takeout right in your very own kitchen. Feel free to mix up the protein or vegetables depending on what you have in your fridge. The simple sauce packs a flavor punch that will bring the dish together, no matter what.
Whip up this zesty Creamy Lemon Chicken for a dinner that's bursting with flavor! With tender chicken, a velvety sauce, and a hint of citrus, this dish is sure to become a weeknight favorite.

Calling all honey garlic lovers! This One-Pan Honey Garlic Chicken is a one-way ticket to flavor town - juicy chicken thighs coated in a sticky, sweet sauce that will have you licking your plate clean!

This comforting and hearty meal is the perfect hands off dinner plan. Tender and juicy chicken is slow-cooked along side carrots and potatoes and a blend of savory spices. Biscuit dough finishes this dish off for a filling meal all in one scoop.

Savor the sweet and savory flavors of this Garlic Brown Sugar Chicken that'll have your taste buds dancing! With a mouthwatering glaze and a hint of garlic, this dish is perfect for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion.

Experience the zesty flavors of Italy with this Easy Chicken Piccata recipe that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. Tender chicken breasts are coated in a tangy lemon-caper sauce, making every bite a delightful experience.

With a medley of colorful veggies, tender chicken, and slurp-worthy noodles drenched in sweet teriyaki sauce, every bite of this Chicken Teriyaki Chow Mein is a textural adventure that'll take your taste buds on a ride.

Get ready to wok your taste buds to paradise with this sizzling Chicken Teriyaki Fried Rice! With succulent chicken bites, vibrant veggies, and fluffy rice drenched in sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, every bite will take you straight to flavor heaven.

It's the end of yet another long day and well, you're ready to put your feet up, relax, and tuck into a comforting meal. Delivery might be calling your name, but you've got a ton of chicken lying around and with not much else to do, now's the perfect time to whip up a batch of these simple and cozy chicken and dumplings. Tuck in now.
Looking for a refreshing and impressive dinner? This dish features succulent shrimp cooked in garlic and lemon, creating a zesty and refreshing flavor that will tantalize your taste buds.

Whip up this scrumptious Honey Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry for a quick and easy weeknight meal! Bursting with flavor, this dish combines succulent shrimp, fresh veggies, and a finger-licking honey garlic sauce that'll have you coming back for seconds.

Get your greens with this garlicky broccoli shrimp stir-fry! Tender shrimp crisp broccoli is stir-fried with aromatic garlic and ginger for a dish that's both healthy and flavorful. It's perfect for a busy weeknight dinner.
This sheet pan shrimp boil is a crowd-pleaser. It's loaded with juicy shrimp, tender potatoes, and sweet corn, all tossed in a flavorful blend of spices and served family-style on a sheet pan.

These popcorn shrimp are a crispy and delicious seafood snack that's perfect for any occasion. They're coated in a crispy cornmeal batter and served with a tangy cocktail sauce, making for a perfect party appetizer.

dish_name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos With Creamy Cilantro Sauce
dish_description: Savor the flavors of summer with these Grilled Shrimp Tacos, topped with a zesty Creamy Cilantro Sauce. Perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a backyard BBQ, these tacos are sure to impress your taste buds.

This zucchini linguine with roasted shrimp is a light and fresh pasta dish that's perfect for a summer dinner. The roasted shrimp adds a deliciously smoky flavor, while the zucchini noodles keep it lighter and low-carb.

Dumplings are intimidating (well, they can be). But they also are, in fact, delicious. No matter what you stuff them with, the concept of pillowy, soft dough encasing a luscious, super flavorful filling is enough to warm you up from inside to out. Well, with our homemade dumpling recipe, we’re bringing that warm, fuzzy feeling right to your very own kitchen table.

Dumplings are intimidating (well, they can be). But they also are, in fact, delicious. No matter what you stuff them with, the concept of pillowy, soft dough encasing a luscious, super flavorful filling is enough to warm you up from inside to out. Well, with our homemade dumpling recipe, we’re bringing that warm, fuzzy feeling right to your very own kitchen table.
Whip up these scrumptious 3-Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies in a snap! With just peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, you'll have a delightful treat that's perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

Puff Pastry Salmon, also known as Salmon Wellington, is an impressive dish perfect for a special occasion. A beautiful piece of salmon is wrapped in buttery puff pastry with a delicious filling of spinach, cream cheese, and herbs, resulting in a flaky and flavorful centerpiece.

Two words: honey salmon! Sure, it takes a tiny bit of prep work, but once you marinate your salmon, you won’t be able to go back. A simple mix of honey, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger coats and flavors your fish for 30 minutes before you throw it on the pan until the outside is perfectly crispy. Once that’s done, you heat up and reduce some extra marinade to make a thick, to-die-for glaze to pour over your filet. Serve with your favorite veggies or rice and enjoy!

Easy glazed pork chops are a quick and tasty dinner option that can be made in under 30 minutes. They are coated in a sweet and savory glaze that caramelizes on the outside of the pork chops when cooked.

It’s been years since you got that slow cooker as a gift and well, outside of a hearty chili, you don’t quite know what to do with it. Well get ready, because it’s time to pull it back out and put together a barbecuing favorite: ribs. That’s right. All you have to do is prep, and let the cooker do the work. With these baby back ribs, you won’t even miss going to Chili’s anymore.

Bursting with vibrant flavors, this Honey Lime Fruit Salad is a refreshing treat for any occasion. With a zesty honey-lime dressing, it's a delightful dance of sweet and tangy that'll have you coming back for seconds.
A nice refreshing Cucumber, Tomato, And Avocado Salad
